name: Divine Favor
description_1: You grant the favor of your god to a target within near. The target gains +1 damage rolls.

name: Purify Food and Drink
description_1: With a touch, food and drink becomes consumable again to grant nurishment. Removes poison, disease, and rot from food and drink.

name: Inflict Wounds
description_1: Your malevolent touch destroys life.
description_2: Roll a number of d6s equal to 1 + half your level (rounded down). One living target you touch is dealt that much damage.

name: Command Undead
description_1: You command undead creatures, forcing your will upon them. You must present a holy symbol to cast this spell.
description_2: Undead creatures within near of you must make a CHA check vs. your spellcasting check. If a creature fails by 10+ points and is equal to or less than your level, it is now under your command. Otherwise, on a fail, it is stunned for 5 rounds.

name: Aid
description_1: You bolster the resolve of a target within near. For the spell's duration the target gains 4 temporary hitpoints and advantage on morale checks.

name: Prayer
description_1: Upon citing a prayer to your god grants blessings to you and your allies while also condemning those who stand against you.
description_2: Allies within near gain advantage on their next attack roll or spellcasting check.
description_3: Enemies within near gain disadvantage on their next attack roll or spellcasting check.

name: Heroism
description_1: You impart heroic inspiration to a target within near. For the spell's duration they are immune to morale checks and have advantage on attack rolls.

name: Spiritual Weapon
description_1: You manifest a magical melee weapon of your choice in your hand made of spiritual energy.
description_2: This is a +1 weapon that increases to +2 at LVL 6.
description_3: It deals an additional 1d4 damage against Fiends, Outsiders, and Undead.

name: Smite
description_1: You call down punishing flames on a creature you can see within range. It takes 2d6 damage.

name: Curse
description_1: Uttering words of damnation, you target a enemy creature and curse them. As long as the spell is maintained they have disadvantage on all attack and spellcasting checks.

name: Mantle of Hope
description_1: Holy light baths you as you're filled with hope. Each successful attack or spell cast by you or an ally heals 1 hit point within near.

name: Mass Inflict
description_1: All living enemies within near range of you take 2d6 damage.

name: Righteous Fevor
description_1: You're filled with an overwhelming righteousness. For the spells duraction you gain a bonus to attacks rolls equal to your level.

name: Flamestrike
description_1: You call down a holy pillar of fire, immolating one creature you can see within range. The target takes 3d6 damage.

name: Adhesive
description_1: You conjure forth a thick, sticky substance covering half a near sized surface.
description_2: All creatures inside the target area must make a DC11 dexterity check or be unable to move for the spell's duration.

name: Chilling Touch
description_1: Your hand forms a layer of ice as you reach out. The target takes 1d4 damage and they must make a DC11 constitution check or become weakened.

name: Color Spray
description_1: You spread your fingers with thumbs touching, unleashing a prismatic circle that blasts up to a close area around where you stand.
description_2: Creatures within the area of effect are either blinded, stunned, or put to sleep for spell's duration. Roll 1d3 to determine the effect.

name: Disguise Self
description_1: You take on the appearance of someone you've recently seen. Small or medium humanoids only.
description_2: You've must have seen their face and most of their body, whether it be from a painting, drawing, or in person.

name: Good Berry
description_1: You target a bush or shurb and cause it to grow 1d4 plump berries.
description_2: Each berry consumed cures 1d4 hit points, this increases to 2d4 at LVL 6.
description_3: You may only consume one berry per rest.

name: Grease
description_1: You conjure forth a thick, slick substance covering half a near sized surface.
description_2: All creatures inside the target area must make a DC11 dexterity check or fall prone.

name: Shocking Grasp
description_1: Electrical discharge forms around your hand as you reach out. The target takes 1d4 damage, the damage is increased to 2d4 if the target is heavily armored.

name: Thorn Whip
description_1: You conjure a thorny vine and lash out at a creature within near. The target takes 1d4 damage and must make a STR check vs. your spell casting check or be pulled a close distance towards you.

name: Air Walk
description_1: You begin to walk on air as if it's solid as the ground. You walk at half speed and are unable to run while the spell is maintained.

name: Barkskin
description_1: The target creature's skin hardens and appears to be made of wood. You gain resistance to non-magical physical attacks.

name: Call Lightning
description_1: You summon a crackling thunder cloud overhead that unleashes a lightning bolt that deals 1d6 damage.
description_2: As long as focus is maintained you may summon a lightning bolt at a target creature.

name: False Life
description_1: Incantations bolster your physical form. Roll a number of d4s equal to half your level (rounded down) and apply that as temporary hit points for the spell's duration.

name: Gust of Wind
description_1: A whirlwind form around you. Creature within one-half of near must make a STR check vs your spell casting check or be pushed to near distance and knocked prone.

name: Ice Slick
description_1: You conjure forth a snap freeze that deals 1d6 damage and creates a thick sheet of ice covering half a near sized surface.
description_2: All creatures inside the target area must make a DC12 dexterity check or fall prone.

name: Scorching Ray
description_1: A flaming ray shoots from your finger and scorches a creature dealing 1d6 damage.
description_2: On a spell check of 19+ the damage is doubled.

name: Touch of Idiocy
description_1: Your hand glows an eerie green hue as you reach out. The target creature's spell checks and spell damage have disadvantage for the duration of the spell.

name: Haste
description_1: You change the flow of time, speeding up a creature within near range. Target gains one additional action for the spell's duration.
description_2: While hasted you may attack twice, cast two spells, or move twice.

name: Slow
description_1: You change the flow of time, slowing down a creature within near range. Target loses one action for the spell's duration.
description_2: While slowed you may only perform one action; be it attack, cast a spell, or move.

name: Burst of Nettles
description_1: You release a burst of barbed nettles in near circle around you. Creatures within the area take 2d6 damage.
description_2: For the next 3 rounds creatures hit take an additional 1d4 damage on their turn.

name: Deep Slumber
description_1: You weave a powerful lulling spell that fills a near-sized cube extending from you. Living creatures in the area of effect fall into a deep sleep if they are LV 4 or less.
description_2: Vigorous shaking or being injured wakes them.

name: Thorny Entanglement
description_1: Touching the ground you conjure fourth grasping vines covered in thorns that covers a near sized surface.
description_2: Creatures caught in the vines have their movement halfed and take 1d6 damage.

name: Thunderclap
description_1: You slam the ground with your hands, unleashing a thunderous wave that errupts out to a double close area from where you stand.
description_2: Creatures within the area of effect take 2d6 damage, and are thrown close range landing prone.

name: Vampiric Touch
description_1: Your hand glows a sinister red hue as you reach out. The target takes 2d6 damage, and you heal an amount equal to the damage dealt.

name: Witness
description_1: You psychically meld with another creatures mind, through this connection you can see and hear as they do for the duration of the spell.
description_2: When the spell ends the creature makes a DC13 WIS check to know they've been targeted.
